trait_additional_properties_json.description: A grab-bag object for non-validatable data.
trait_additional_properties_json.title: Has additional properties

trait_platform_pitch_event_json.description: Trait that represents an update event for a pitch to a platform. In the Arc ecosystem, this data is generated by WebSked.

note.description: Optional note associated with this update.

status.description: The current status of the pitch.

user_id.description: The ID of the user who made this update.

trait_platform_pitch_event_json.title: Platform pitch event

description: Trait that represents a pitch to a platform. In the Arc ecosystem, this data is generated by WebSked.

platform_path.description: The path of the platform that this pitch targets.

title: Platform pitch
